Package com.xhive.index.interfaces

This package contains the interfaces for the indexes and index list.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
XhiveCCIndexIf A Context Conditioned index is created by using the addNodeFilterIndex factory method on the XhiveIndexListIf.
XhiveIndexIf An XhiveIndexIf index stores key-value pairs, of wich the key is an object like a string, integer, etcetera, and the value is a node set.
XhiveIndexKeyIteratorIf An iterator that iterates over keys in an index, allowing lookup of the nodes for the current key.
XhiveIndexListIf The XhiveIndexListIf stores all XhiveIndexIf objects.
XhiveIndexNodeFilterIf The XhiveIndexNodeFilterIf interface should be implented whenever you want to build an index.
 

Package com.xhive.index.interfaces Description

This package contains the interfaces for the indexes and index list.

X-Hive currently supports three kinds of indexes:

  • Indexes that improve XQuery and XPath performance. These indexes index elementnames, element values, attribute values, attribute id's, library child names, library child id's and are incremental
  • Nodefilter indexes that enable quick retrieval of data selected by a nodefilter. These indexes are not incremental
This package contains the interfaces of the first two types of indexes
